font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 通知，告知：to give notice to; inform
【例】apprise him of the danger that may be involved 告知他可能涉及的危险
【近】inform, acquaint, make known to
【反】withhold information 隐瞒信息

【记】 通知大家,大奖(prise)的得主是谁
